post.title: Delete Spreadsheet Rows For Google Sheets
post.html:
�

This product is a simple add on for Google Sheets that allows you to delete rows in bulk according to specified criteria.

Please contact support@automationfuel.com for help.

Note that this product is for use with Google Sheets but was not developed by Google. AutomationFuel is not affiliated with Google.

Installation

You can download this add on from the Google Play Store.

Once installed, to use the add on, please navigate to the spreadsheet you wish to manipulate.

After opening your Google Sheet click the Addons menu. Next, go to "Google Sheets Delete Rows" => Quick Start. Enter the value for the rows you’d like to delete. For example, if you enter "foo" rows with this exact value will be removed but rows with the value "foo bar" will be spared.

At this stage, you can exit the sidebar without deleting anything if you chose by clicking "Close sidebar" at the bottom of the sidebar.

If you wish to undo any deletions, you can use the shortcut command-Z.
